creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
description: Small jug with pulled handle and short, straight spout; slight flare with wide neck and flaring mouth; tan glaze with green drips; Ch'ang-sha ware
medium: Sancai ware Stoneware with dripped green glaze
text: This well preserved ewer was made at Ch'ang-sha in Hunan province where the use of light green drip glaze was popular. It can be seen as a variation of standard san-ts'ai galze which features amber, blue, and green like the other works shown here.
title: Ewer
